transArray.content:
Facilities: Very complete facilities
Hygiene: Hygienic, clean and tidy
Environment: The environment is very good and very quiet
Service: Excellent service, very nice

Hello dear guests! Thank you for choosing us among many hotels. Thank you very much for your support and trust in our work. The hotel is Hanting version 2.7, with novel decoration and complete facilities. The surrounding transportation is convenient, with restaurants and supermarkets available, which can meet all your needs. The hotel has also added a delivery robot, a free self-service laundry room, and a dryer. The breakfast buffet has a complete range of Chinese and Western varieties and tastes very good. I hope you will bring your family to taste it next time you stay.
